title: Giuliani Ukraine Allies & 2020 Elections
itunes:title: Giuliani Ukraine Allies & 2020 Elections
description:
Kevin spoke with Brad Blakeman, Republican Strategist and Former Deputy Assistant to President George W. Bush, and Isaac Wright, Democratic Strategist and Partner at Forward Solution Strategy Group. They discussed the impeachment saga, Giuliani's Ukraine allies getting arrested, the 2020 presidential elections and the roll of faith voters.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
